name: 羅元隆
objective:
本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
The course is designed for students with engineering backgrounds. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to consolidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.
schedule:
第 01 週 / 測量、直線運動   Week01 Measurement, Motion in one-dimension
第 02 週 / 向量、二維與三維運動   Week02 Vectors, Motion in two and three dimensions
第 03 週 / 牛頓定律、動力學   Week03 Newton's laws, Particle dynamics
第 04 週 / 做功與能量   Week04 Work and energy
第 05 週 / 能量守恆   Week05 Conservation of energy
第 06 週 / 質心與線性慣量   Week06 Center of mass, linear momentum
第 07 週 / 轉動   Week07 Rotation
第 08 週 / 扭矩與角動量   Week08 Torque, Angular momentum
第 09 週 / 期中考   Week09 Mid-term Exam
第 10 週 / 固體平衡   Week10 Equilibrium of rigid bodies
第 11 週 / 振盪   Week11 Oscillation
第 12 週 / 重力   Week12 Gravitation
第 13 週 / 流體靜力學   Week13 Fluid statics
第 14 週 / 流體動力學   Week14 Fluid dynamics
第 15 週 / 波學   Week15 Waves, Sound waves
第 16 週 / 溫度、熱力學第一定律   Week16 Temperature, The first law of thermodynamics
第 17 週 / 熱力學第二定律及氣體方程式   Week17 The second law of thermodynamics, The idea gas
第 18 週 / 期末考   Week18 Final Exam
materials:
Young & Freedman, University Physics
其他待定
